General.Name: Kunshan Dongwei Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Kunshan Dongwei Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of print circuit board plating equipment in China. It also offers general metal plating, plastic plating, anodizing line, and PCB plating/wet process equipment; barrel plating equipment; and accessories, as well as technical services for surface treatment engineering. In addition, it offers engineering consulting, application training, and technical support services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Kunshan, China.
General.Address: East of Dongding Road, Kunshan, China, 215311
